resources.string: This will reset the counter to zero. Are you really want to reset?
Enter the target you want to count up to or down to:
This action exceeds maximum allowed value %1$d
This action exceeds minimum allowed value %1$d
We can no longer decrease the count because minimum allowed count is %1$d
We can no longer increase the count because maximum allowed count is %1$d
Steps value can not be empty
This value must be between %1$d and -%2$d
The new target set is same as old
Steps can not be greater than current target
Enter the number by which the tally count should increase or decrease when + or - button clicked
We are unable to set target to %1$d. The target can only be set between %2$d and %3$d
